sources.title: The Island Monster (1954) BORIS KARLOFF
sources.description:
Stars: Boris Karloff, Franca Marzi, Renato Vicario
Director: Roberto Bianchi Montero

An Italian government agent is assigned to break up a drug smuggling ring on the island of Ischia but his daughter is kidnapped by the gang.

metadata.Plot: An Italian government agent is assigned to break up a drug smuggling ring on the island of Ischia but his daughter is kidnapped by the gang.
metadata.Writer: Roberto Bianchi Montero, Carlo Lombardo, Alberto Vecchietti
metadata.Actors: Boris Karloff, Franca Marzi, Renato Vicario
